The tool ssh-user-enum appears to be prompting for a password, not effectively enumerating users.

Next, I'll try a different approach for username enumeration by testing login responses manually for each username in userlist.txt using an ssh connection with a false password to detect any difference in authentication messages or timing.

I'll create a small script to automate this using timeout and ssh's non-interactive mode to avoid hanging connections.

Command: for user in $(cat userlist.txt); do timeout 3 ssh -o BatchMode=yes -o ConnectTimeout=3 -p 2292 $user@172.10.0.3; done
